Package com.tloj.game.utilities

package com.tloj.game.utilities
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.tloj.game
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ConsoleHandler
    Utility class to handle console operations, such as:
    - Set console encoding to UTF-8
    - Clear console
    - Escape codes for text colors
    Constants
    This class contains all the constants used in the game.
    ASCII art, story text and music file paths are stored here.
    FirebaseHandler
    Utility class to handle Firebase operations, such as:
    - Save game to cloud
    - Load game from cloud
    - Delete game from cloud
    JsonParser
    This class is a utility class for parsing JSON files.
    MusicPlayer
    Class that represents a music player in the game
    Used to play music files in the game
    NetworkUtils
    Utility class to handle network operations, such as:
    - Check if internet is available
